                        var pi_user_id = "";
                        var pi_user_code = "";

                        function set_points(points) {
                            if(pi_user_id != "" && pi_user_code != "")
                            {
                                var data = {
                                            'pi_user_id': pi_user_id,
                                            'pi_user_code': pi_user_code,
                                            'points': points,
                                            'csrf_token': odoo.csrf_token,
                                        };
                                return $.post( "/pi-points", data).done(function(data) {
                                    data = JSON.parse(data);
                                    //if(data.result)
                                    //    alert("You won " + points + " points");
                                    //$("#refresh").click();
                                }).fail(function() {
                                    
                                });
                            }
                        }
                        
                        function get_user() {
                            if(pi_user_id != "" && pi_user_code != "")
                            {
                                var data = {
                                            'pi_user_id': pi_user_id,
                                            'pi_user_code': pi_user_code,
                                            'csrf_token': odoo.csrf_token,
                                        };
                                return $.post( "/get-user", data).done(function(data) {
                                    data = JSON.parse(data);
                                    if(data.result)
                                    {
                                        if(data.unblocked)
                                        {   
                                            $("#verified").html(" (verified)");                 
                                            $("#verified").show();
                                        }
                                    }
                                }).fail(function() {
                                    
                                });
                            }
                        }

                        $( document ).ready(function() {
                            $("#verified").hide();
                            const Pi = window.Pi;
                            Pi.init({ version: "2.0", sandbox: $("#sandbox").val() });
                            
                            async function auth() {
                                try {
                                    // Identify the user with their username / unique network-wide ID, and get permission to request payments from them.
                                    const scopes = ['username', 'payments'];
                                    function onIncompletePaymentFound(payment) {
                                        
                                    }; // Read more about this in the SDK reference

                                    Pi.authenticate(scopes, onIncompletePaymentFound).then(function(auth) {
                                        pi_user_id = auth.user.uid;
                                        pi_user_code = auth.user.username;
                                        $("#username").html(" " + auth.user.username);
                                        
                                        $("#leaderboard").attr("href", "/get-points/" + auth.user.username);
                                        
                                        set_points(0);
                                        get_user();
                                    }).catch(function(error) {
                                        //Pi.openShareDialog("Error", error);
                                        //alert(err);
                                        console.error(error);
                                    });
                                } catch (err) {
                                    //Pi.openShareDialog("Error", err);
                                    //alert(err);
                                    console.error(err);
                                    // Not able to fetch the user
                                }
                            }
                            
                            auth();
                            
                            const shareData = {
                                title: 'LatinChain Platform',
                                text: 'Hi. Check it out this Pi App: LatinChain Platform (LatinChain Games from Latin America which work with the Pi Network). Try it in Pi Browser. #PiNetwork #PiApps https://latin-chain.com/',
                                //url: 'https://latin-chain.com/',
                            }

                            //$("#social_div").css("visibility", "visible");
                            const btn = document.querySelector('#button1');
                            //const resultPara = document.querySelector('.result');
                            
                            // Must be triggered some kind of "user activation"
                            btn.addEventListener('click', async () => {
                                if (!navigator.share) {
                                    Pi.openShareDialog(shareData.title, shareData.text);
                                }else
                                {
                                  try {
                                    await navigator.share(shareData);
                                    //resultPara.textContent = 'MDN shared successfully'
                                  } catch(err) {
                                    //alert('Error: ' + err);
                                  }
                                }
                            });
                        });
